title: Basic assumptions in the Pep1p5 study
description:
You can explore here:
Scenarios are no predictions, but projections. Thus, the underlying models follow various assumptions and have an individual inner logic.

Below you can explore the basic assumptions of three scenarios from the REMIND-MAgPIE model in the Pep1p5 study, conducted in 2018.

This information can be investigated for
  • Different warming levels
  • With full or reduced availibility of carbon dioxide removal (CDR) technologies
